title: Classic Margherita Pizza
ingredients: tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil, pizza dough
instructions: Roll out pizza dough. Spread tomato sauce evenly. Add mozzarella cheese. Bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: chicken breast, bell pepper, onion, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil
instructions: Cut chicken into strips. Heat oil in wok. Cook chicken until golden. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Serve hot.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, caesar dressing, lemon
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce. Toss with caesar dressing. Add croutons and shaved parmesan. Squeeze fresh lemon juice on top.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, eggs, parmesan cheese, black pepper, garlic
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon until crispy. Mix eggs with parmesan. Combine hot pasta with bacon, then add egg mixture off heat. Season with black pepper.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, onion
instructions: Brown ground beef with spices. Warm taco shells. Fill with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream. Top with diced onion.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: cucumber, tomato, feta cheese, olives, red onion, olive oil, lemon
instructions: Chop cucumber and tomato. Add feta cheese, olives, and sliced red onion. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken thighs, curry powder, coconut milk, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and brown. Stir in curry powder and tomato. Pour coconut milk and simmer 30 minutes.

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: arborio rice, mushrooms, vegetable broth, white wine, parmesan cheese, onion, butter
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onion. Add rice and toast. Gradually add broth while stirring. Finish with parmesan and butter.

title: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: salmon fillet, lemon, dill, olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper
instructions: Marinate salmon with lemon, dill, garlic, and olive oil. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: carrot, celery, onion, potato, vegetable broth, tomato, herbs
instructions: Chop all vegetables. Sauté onion, carrot, and celery. Add potato, tomato, and broth. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Season with herbs.
